bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Alluxio became unresponsive when loading metadata
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? alluxio version -r 2.3.1-SNAPSHOT-238b7eb3ec58270aabf7004ac01cc89e6034b93e Describe the bug From the client side: <denchmark-code>2020-11-17 02:33:55,916 WARN MetaMasterClient - GetMasterInfo(fields=[LEADER_MASTER_ADDRESS, WEB_PORT, SAFE_MODE, START_TIME_MS, UP_TIME_MS, VERSION, RPC_PORT, ZOOKEEPER_ADDRESSES]) exits with exception [alluxio.exception.status.UnavailableException: Failed to connect to MetaMaster @ 192.168.5.109:20000 after 1 attempts] in 374259 ms (>=1000ms) 2020-11-17 02:33:55,923 ERROR AbstractShell - Error running report summary alluxio.exception.status.UnavailableException: Failed to connect to MetaMaster @ 192.168.5.109:20000 after 1 attempts at alluxio.AbstractClient.connect(AbstractClient.java:278) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPCInternal(AbstractClient.java:402) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPC(AbstractClient.java:371) at alluxio.AbstractClient.retryRPC(AbstractClient.java:360) at alluxio.client.meta.RetryHandlingMetaMasterClient.getMasterInfo(RetryHandlingMetaMasterClient.java:99) at alluxio.cli.fsadmin.report.SummaryCommand.printMetaMasterInfo(SummaryCommand.java:85) at alluxio.cli.fsadmin.report.SummaryCommand.run(SummaryCommand.java:70) at alluxio.cli.fsadmin.command.ReportCommand.run(ReportCommand.java:157) at alluxio.cli.AbstractShell.run(AbstractShell.java:137) at alluxio.cli.fsadmin.FileSystemAdminShell.main(FileSystemAdminShell.java:71) Caused by: alluxio.exception.status.UnavailableException: Target Unavailable. GrpcChannelKey{ClientType=MetaMaster, ClientHostname=iZuf6afslw5j6hauyzkw21Z, ServerAddress=GrpcServerAddress{HostName=192.168.5.109, SocketAddress=192.168.5.109:20000}, ChannelId=2e9a3a89-02f4-4333-ac53-16ad5e32f1f2} at alluxio.grpc.GrpcChannelBuilder.build(GrpcChannelBuilder.java:144) at alluxio.AbstractClient.connect(AbstractClient.java:231) ... 9 more Caused by: alluxio.exception.status.UnavailableException: Waited 30000 milliseconds (plus 117081 nanoseconds delay) for com.google.common.util.concurrent.SettableFuture@4c1f22f3[status=PENDING] at alluxio.security.authentication.AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.waitUntilChannelAuthenticated(AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.java:194) at alluxio.security.authentication.AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.startAuthenticatedChannel(AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.java:164) at alluxio.security.authentication.ChannelAuthenticator.authenticate(ChannelAuthenticator.java:103) at alluxio.grpc.GrpcChannelBuilder.build(GrpcChannelBuilder.java:129) ... 10 more Caused by: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: Waited 30000 milliseconds (plus 117081 nanoseconds delay) for com.google.common.util.concurrent.SettableFuture@4c1f22f3[status=PENDING] at com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture.get(AbstractFuture.java:494) at com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture$TrustedFuture.get(AbstractFuture.java:97) at alluxio.security.authentication.AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.waitUntilChannelAuthenticated(AuthenticatedChannelClientDriver.java:181) ... 13 more 2020-11-17 02:34:02,427 INFO Reflections - Reflections took 185 ms to scan 2 urls, producing 70 keys and 368 values 2020-11-17 02:34:02,601 INFO NettyUtils - EPOLL_MODE is available 2020-11-17 02:45:47,398 INFO Reflections - Reflections took 191 ms to scan 2 urls, producing 70 keys and 368 values 2020-11-17 02:45:47,573 INFO NettyUtils - EPOLL_MODE is available </denchmark-code>
From the server side: <denchmark-code>bash-4.4# jstack 44406 2020-11-17 02:28:28 Full thread dump OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (25.212-b04 mixed mode):
"Attach Listener" #77 daemon prio=9 os_prio=0 tid=0x000055b09dd38000 nid=0xaca9 waiting on condition [0x0000000000000000] java.lang.Thread.State: RUNNABLE
